Plot: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.
Title: 8½
Writer: Federico Fellini (story), Ennio Flaiano (story), Ennio Flaiano (screenplay), Tullio Pinelli (screenplay), Federico Fellini (screenplay), Brunello Rondi (screenplay)
Actors: Marcello Mastroianni, Claudia Cardinale, Anouk Aimée, Sandra Milo
